ESTSS.title: ESTSS
ESTSS.subtitle: Company Films
ESTSS.description: We create cinematic company films that highlight your story, values, and achievements. Using high-end cameras, lenses, and precise lighting, we capture the true identity of your organization with clarity and impact.

Zarabi.title: Zarabi
Zarabi.subtitle: Commercial Films
Zarabi.description: Strategic commercial films built to boost visibility and drive engagement. Perfect for brands aiming to convert views into customers through cinematic storytelling and clean visuals.

FinalEdition.title: Final Edition
FinalEdition.subtitle: Cars Films
FinalEdition.description: Premium car and showroom films showcasing vehicles with cinematic movement, drone shots, and detail-focused visuals. Ideal for dealerships, luxury brands, and new model launches.

BeachyRentals.title: Beachy Rentals
BeachyRentals.subtitle: Real Estate Films
BeachyRentals.description: We produce high-quality real estate films that bring spaces to life. Perfect for agents, developers, and luxury property owners looking for cinematic walkthroughs and stunning detail shots.

PodcastProduction.title: Florian Homm
PodcastProduction.subtitle: Podcast Films
PodcastProduction.description: Professional podcast filmingâ€”especially weekly solo podcast episodes. We come to your location with full gear and handle filming, audio recording, lighting, and editing.

EventCoverage.title: Art Gallery
EventCoverage.subtitle: Event Films
EventCoverage.description: High-quality event film production capturing the moments, energy, and atmosphere of your event. Perfect for conferences, launches, activations, exhibitions, and corporate gatherings.

timeLine.title: Prostdios Project Timeline
timeLine.subtitle: A refined cinematic process â€” from first idea to final frame.

section1.desc1: We start by understanding your brand story and communication goals. Our team aligns on the creative direction, audience, tone, and key message â€” ensuring every frame has purpose.
section1.deliverables1: Deliverables | Creative brief, concept outline, and moodboard.
section1.desc2: Storytelling begins here. We craft a visual narrative that connects emotionally with your audience. This includes scriptwriting, storyboarding, and visual style planning.
section1.deliverables2: Deliverables | Final concept deck, script, and storyboard.

section2.title: Pre-Production
section2.desc: Precision before production. We handle location scouting, permits, talent casting, equipment setup, and scheduling. Everything is prepared down to the smallest cinematic detail.
section2.deliverables: Deliverables | Shooting schedule, cast list, call sheets, and production plan.

section3.desc1: Lights. Camera. Storytelling. Our directors, DOPs, and crew bring the concept to life using industry-leading cameras, lenses, lighting, and drone cinematography.
section3.deliverables1: Deliverables | Raw footage and behind-the-scenes material.
section3.desc2: Where the story takes shape. Our editors, sound designers, and colorists refine every frame â€” adding music, voice-overs, animations, and VFX when needed.
section3.deliverables2: Deliverables | First cut, revised edit, and final master.

section4.title: Review & Feedback
section4.desc: We collaborate with you for review and fine-tuning. Our process includes multiple feedback rounds to ensure your vision is fully realized.

section5.desc1: Your film is delivered in full resolution, optimized for all platforms â€” broadcast, cinema, or social media. We also provide optional subtitled and teaser versions.
section5.deliverables1: Deliverables | 4K final film, social cuts, and delivery package.
section5.desc2: We help you plan the launch â€” from social rollout strategy to cinematic teaser edits that boost engagement.
section5.deliverables2: Deliverables | Launch plan, teaser reels, and performance insights.

footer.title: OUR STANDARD
footer.description: Every project follows a clear path. Cinematic creativity, strategic storytelling, and precise execution â€” because quality is never optional.
